content: लघु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (घु|घ्वी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Light, not heavy; तृणादपि लघुस्तूलस्तूलादपि च याचकः <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; रिक्तः सर्वो भवति हि लघुः पूर्णता गौरवाय <ls>Me. 20</ls> (where the word means ‘contemptible’ also); <ls>R. 9. 62.</ls> {@--2@} Little, small, diminutive; <ls>Pt. 1. 253</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 38</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 9.">78.</ls> {@--3@} Short, brief, concise; लघुसंदेशपदा सरस्वती <ls>R. 8. 77.</ls> {@--4@} Trifling, trivial, insignificant, unimportant; कायस्थ इति लघ्वी मात्रा <ls>Mu. 1.</ls> {@--5@} Low, mean, despicable, contemptible; <ls>Śi. 9. 23</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 106.</ls> {@--6@} Weak, feeble. {@--7@} Wretched, frivolous. {@--8@} Active, light, nimble, agile; <ls>Ś. 2. 5.</ls> {@--9@} Swift, quick, rapid; किंचित् पश्चाद् व्रज लघुगतिः <ls>Me. 16</ls>; <ls>R. 5. 45.</ls> {@--10@} Easy, not difficult; <ls>R. 12. 66.</ls> {@--11@} Easy to be digested, light (as food). {@--12@} Short, (as a vowel in prosody). {@--13@} Soft, low, gentle. {@--14@} Pleasant, agreeable, desirable; <ls>R. 11. 12</ls>, <ls n="R. 11.">80.</ls> {@--15@} Lovely, handsome, beautiful. {@--16@} Pure, clean. {@--17@} Sapless, pithless. {@--18@} Young, younger; <ls>Mv. 6. 53.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>N.</ab> of the Nakṣatras Hasta, Puṣya, and Aśvinī. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} A particular measure of time. {@--2@} Agallochum, or a particular variety of it. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Lightly, meanly, contemptuously; लघु मन् ‘to think lightly of, despise, slight’; <ls>Ś. 7. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Quickly, swiftly; लघु लघुत्थिता <ls>Ś. 4</ls> ‘risen early’.
लघ्वी {@--1@} A delicate woman. {@--2@} A light carriage; <ls>Śi. 12. 24.</ls>
